name: Tim Weninger
content: Tim Weninger, PhD – Tim Weninger Skip to content My name is Tim Weninger; I am an Associate Professor and Director of Graduate Studies in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering in the College of Engineering at the University of Notre Dame. I am also affiliated with the Lucy Family Institute for Data and Society, the Pulte Institute for Global Development, and the Technology Ethics Center. My research is in artificial intelligence and social media (and artificial intelligence on social media). Generally speaking, I am interested in how humans consume and curate information.. This work is funded through separate grants from the US National Science Foundation, the Army Research Office, DARPA, USAID, the Templeton Foundation via the University of Chicago, the Air Force Office of Scientific Research, and the Pacific Northwest National Laboratory. I’m currently hiring intelligent, motivated graduate students. Please send me an email if you’re interested.
